褷字的基本解释

褷
shī
〔离褷〕羽毛初生的样子，如“凫雏褷褷。”

褷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shī］
［《廣韻》所宜切，平支，生。］
(1)羽毛初生貌。
(2)羽毛丰盛貌。参见“褷褷”。
(3)用同“祁”。众多貌。参见“褷褷”。

褷字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褷； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1123第02
【集韻】山宜切，音簛。【廣韻】同襹。【類篇】襳襹，毛羽衣貌。或从徙。【韓愈詩】?花著兩眼，視物隔褷䙰。【皮日休詩】袖香䙰褷風。

褷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
褷字的起名意思

暂无。

Shame
Basic explanation of words
Shame
shī
〔Li Yu〕 The feathers look like when they are born.
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shī]
["Guangyun" is suitable for cutting, flat branch, raw. ]
(1) Feathers' appearance.
(2) The feathers are rich and graceful. See "wandering".
(3) Use the same "Qi". Many appearances. See "wandering".
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　褷; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1123 No. 02
【Jiyun】Mountain is suitable for cutting, and the sound is 簛. [Guangyun] The same sibling. 【Category】Chin and feathers, hairy clothes and appearance. Or migrating. [Han Yushi]? With two eyes, looking at things apart. 【Pi Rixiu Poems】Sleeve incense and fawn wind.
